basics.name: Jun Yu (Johnny) Chen

work.summary: Interdisciplinary research on neural mechanisms and machine learning applications.

Integrated AIRL into hidden state models for mouse trajectory analysis.

work.name: Job Junior

Deployed over 480 company websites, annotating 50,000 training data within 3 months.

work.name: Stein Eyes Institute
